resources.string: Game is simple, don\'t run out of time! During game different boxes will appear randomly on screen - boxes with positive values and boxes with negative ones. By tapping box you will get amount of points and time written on box - e.g. +2 box will bring you 2 points and 2 more seconds, and -5 will take-away 5 points and subtract 5 seconds.
Also try to get as much time in one moment as possible, because that affects final score (e.g at one moment you have 93.2 s and value 923.2 will be added to your score as final score)
One last thing - if boxes overlay and you tap there - you will tap BOTH boxes - so be careful! Good luck!
